970120.name: Runes: The Forgotten Path Original Soundtrack
970120.description:
The Original Soundtrack For Runes: The Forgotten Path, by Lorenzo Visintin, contains 45 minutes of original music, exclusively created for the game and mastered in high quality! You will get the 16 tracks in high quality Mp3 format directly in the Steam directory ...Steam\steamapps\common\Runes\Soundtrack



  • 1 Main Theme
  • 2 Towards Oblivion
  • 3 The Tale
  • 4 Try the Spell
  • 5 Shadow in the Forest
  • 6 Battle Theme - Forest
  • 7 The Room
  • 8 Alterego
  • 9 The Magic in My Hands
  • 10 Oblivion Subsoil
  • 11 The Confrontation
  • 12 Battle Theme - Beach
  • 13 Finale
  • 14 BONUS - BONUS - Shadow in the Forest - Darker
  • 15 BONUS - BONUS - The Room - Ancestral
  • 16 BONUS - BONUS - The Room - Light
970120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
